price: 11. kecuali orang-orang yang sabar, dan mengerjakan kebajikan, mereka memperoleh ampunan dan pahala yang besar.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ṣabarū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
